org.digijava.kernel.translator.action

Class CompleteTranslationAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.struts.action.Action
      • org.apache.struts.actions.BaseAction
        • org.apache.struts.actions.DispatchAction
          • org.digijava.kernel.translator.action.CompleteTranslationAction

  • public class CompleteTranslationAction
extends org.apache.struts.actions.DispatchAction
    This class is used for complete/global translations
